title: O.D.1. - We have consensus
brief_description: Organizational Development (O.D.) ia a major revolutionary and controversial management theory in America, whose influence is beginning to be felt in Britain and Europe. Shows application of O.D. in the running of Sheldon High School, Oregon, USA.
